snippet: In “Summer of Blood,” an offensive and unattractive young man finds his dating life transformed by an encounter with a vampire.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews movie Summer of Blood, directed by and starring Onur Tukel.
lead_paragraph: In “Summer of Blood,” an offensive and unattractive young man finds his dating life transformed by an encounter with a vampire.

headline.seo: In ‘Summer of Blood,’ a Vampirish Makeover
headline.main: From Selfish Slob to Sex God
